===============

**Confederation Building Architectural and Engineering Services RFP**
----------------------------------------------------------

**Tender Reference Number: WS4113508118-Doc4141850652**
**Solicitation Number: WS4113508118**
**Publication Date: August 11, 2023**

**Tender Status: Expired**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for services to complete the Confederation Building Interior and Exterior Life Cycle Repair and Replacement project in the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Project Description:**
Public Works and Government Services Canada intends to retain an architectural firm in the capacity of Prime Consultant, supported by a multidisciplinary team of subconsultants, including:

*   Conservation Architect
*   Structural Engineer with heritage building conservation expertise
*   Mechanical Engineer
*   Electrical Engineer
*   Fire Protection and Building Code Specialist
*   Universal Accessibility Specialist
*   Cost Estimator

The selected prime consultant will be responsible for completing the assessment, analysis, design, and implementation of the project.

**Key Project Requirements:**

*   The prime consultant must have demonstrated expertise in architectural and engineering services, including conservation of heritage buildings.
*   The team must have a proven track record of successfully completing similar projects in the NCR.
*   The prime consultant must demonstrate a thorough understanding of the project requirements and be able to provide a comprehensive proposal.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The proposals will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Procurement Method:**
The procurement will be conducted through a Request for Proposal (RFP) process.

**Contracting Entity:**
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

**Regions of Delivery:**
The project will be delivered in the National Capital Region (NCR).

For more information, please visit the following URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17144123](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17144123)

Speak to the Contracting Authority, Mitskaniouk, Olga, at [olga.mitskaniouk@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:olga.mitskaniouk@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for more information.

**Closing Date:**
The proposal deadline was September 29, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time.
